note.note_text: The AutomataSimulation GUI won't load when running as a Java application. The error message states that there is a major.minor error.
Please look into the major.minor issue with Automata Simulation.
Accepting ticket. I will work on investigating the Java versions used to run the application.
sesmith5: Please provide more information about the version of Java you used to try to run Automata Simulation.
I updated the VM for Automata Simulator to use the latest version of Java 8.
